name: JOE
description: Trader Joe is your one-stop decentralized trading platform on the Avalanche network. We combine DEX services with DeFi lending to offer leveraged trading. Our products are community driven which allows us to give fees collected from liquidation and swaps back to the users via our JOE/xJOE staking mechanism. JOE is a governance token that also rewards its holders with a share of exchange revenues.
